title: Must prevent resale to price discriminate

content.question: Which of the following is necessary for a firm to practice price discrimination?

choices.label: The government strictly enforces antitrust laws.
The firm is a member of a cartel.
The firm can prevent resale of its goods.
The demand curve for the product is perfectly inelastic.
The demand curve for the product is perfectly elastic.

content.answer: The firm can prevent resale of its goods.
